thread.title: China says hopes to work with Japan, South Korea on FTA as soon as possible

title: China says hopes to work with Japan, South Korea on FTA as soon as possible
text:
May 24, 2018 / 2:48 AM / Updated 43 minutes ago China says hopes to work with Japan, South Korea on FTA as soon as possible Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
BEIJING (Reuters) - China hopes to work with Japan and South Korea to reach a mutually beneficial free trade agreement as soon as possible, the Chinese commerce ministry’s spokesman said on Thursday. FILE PHOTO: Security guards walk in front of containers at the Yangshan Deep Water Port in Shanghai, China April 24, 2018. REUTERS/Aly Song/File Photo
China and South Korea will complete the second phase of their free trade agreement negotiations as soon as possible to boost trade, the ministry’s spokesman, Gao Feng, said at a regular news briefing. Reporting by Yawen Chen and Ryan Woo; Editing by Kim Coghill
